title: Asking for Directions
description: Learn natural A2 questions for asking directions.

steps.pinyin: qǐng wèn chē zhàn zěn me zǒu?
steps.english_hint: Excuse me, how do I get to the station?

steps.pinyin: fù jìn yǒu yín háng ma?

steps.teacher: 我要去圖書館，應該往哪裡走？
expected_answer: 我要去圖書館，應該往哪裡走？
steps.pinyin: wǒ yào qù tú shū guǎn, yīng gāi wǎng nǎ lǐ zǒu?
steps.english_hint: I want to go to the library. Which way should I go?

steps.pinyin: cóng zhè lǐ dào gōng yuán yào duō jiǔ?
steps.english_hint: How long does it take to get to the park from here?

steps.teacher: 我迷路了，你可以幫我嗎？
expected_answer: 我迷路了，你可以幫我嗎？
steps.pinyin: wǒ mí lù le, nǐ kě yǐ bāng wǒ ma?
steps.english_hint: I'm lost, can you help me?

steps.pinyin: hái yào zǒu hěn yuǎn ma?
steps.english_hint: Do I still need to walk far?

steps.pinyin: shì wǎng qián hái shì wǎng hòu?
zài biàn lì shāng diàn páng biān ma?
steps.english_hint: Is it next to the convenience store?

steps.pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ huà dì tú gěi wǒ ma?
steps.english_hint: Can you draw a map for me?
